title: Statement by NSC Spokesperson Adrienne Watson on National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan’s Trilateral Dialogue with Japan and the Republic of Korea | The White House
content: National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan, National Security Secretariat Secretary General Akiba Takeo of Japan, and Director of the National Security Office of the Republic of Korea (ROK) Kim Sung-han will meet at the Headquarters of the United States Indo-Pacific Command in Honolulu, Hawaii on September 1, 2022.  The officials will meet bilaterally on August 31.  After the trilateral meeting, Mr. Sullivan will visit the United States Indo-Pacific Command to discuss our alliances in defense of the free and open Indo-Pacific.###
